reasoning_log: The matching process involved identifying key functional areas (Living/Dining, Kitchen, Bathrooms, Bedrooms, Utility areas) first. The three Master Bedroom descriptions (Desc_4, Desc_5, Desc_6) were confirmed to correspond to the three distinct angles of the same highly decorated bedroom (Image_4, Image_5, Image_6), based on the presence of the unique wood feature wall and built-in cabinetry/desk. The two bathrooms were differentiated by the dry/wet separation feature: Desc_7 requires 'good dry/wet separation' and an 'external window', matching Image_7 (glass enclosure and window). Desc_3 requires 'dry/wet not fully separated' and 'wooden ceiling', matching Image_3 (wooden ceiling, no glass enclosure visible). The three secondary rooms (Desc_8, Desc_9, Desc_10) were matched based on specific window types and built-in features (low cabinet in Image_8, corner window in Image_9, proximity to entrance in Image_10). The utility areas (parking and entrance) were straightforward matches.

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows an open-plan living and dining area (客餐廳) with modern furniture, ample storage, and new marble-look flooring, confirming '開放格局' and '地坪新穎'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 開放格局(客廳餐廳連通動線順暢), 明亮度佳(大量嵌燈與淺色地磚反光), 家具可直接入住(大型L型沙發與茶几現成), 收納櫃體多(牆面木作櫃與電視矮櫃), 地坪新穎(拋光石英磚易清理), 天花高度適中(無壓迫感含簡潔崁燈)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image displays a modern, separate kitchen (獨立廚房) with white cabinets, a cooktop area ('完整瓦斯爐具'), and a door/window suggesting connection to a rear balcony ('後陽台連通').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光通風佳(後陽台門與玻璃引入自然光), 完整瓦斯爐具(雙口瓦斯爐與排油煙機), 廚具收納充足(上下櫃體連續設計), 易清潔材質(瓷磚地面與光滑檯面), 可規劃用餐區(空間寬敞可放餐桌), 後陽台連通(門外疑似晾衣或工作陽台)

matching_result_list.evidence: This bathroom features a wooden ceiling and floating vanity ('懸空浴櫃', '木質天花設計'). Crucially, there is no glass enclosure, supporting the tag '乾濕未完全分離'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕未完全分離(僅地面排水無玻璃拉門), 衛浴採光不足(無對外窗僅人工照明), 衛浴整體新穎(牆地磚與衛浴設備新), 懸空浴櫃(減少潮濕積水易打掃), 木質天花設計(質感佳但需注意潮濕保養), 空間寬敞(如廁及淋浴活動範圍大)

matching_result_list.evidence: First angle of the master bedroom, showing the large bed, built-in white wardrobes, and wood feature wall ('內建衣櫃', '裝潢新穎').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 可放特大床(床兩側仍有走道與床頭櫃), 內建衣櫃(整面白色衣櫃提供收納), 裝潢新穎(床頭木作與燈具完整), 採光普通(未見大窗戶僅局部光源), 地坪易清潔(石材地面適合過敏族)

matching_result_list.evidence: Second angle of the master bedroom, clearly showing the window providing '採光良好' and the integrated desk/work area separate from the bed ('休息與工作區分明').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(床側大窗引入自然光), 通風可(可開啟窗戶), 多功能收納(衣櫃加書桌/梳妝台), 休息與工作區分明(床區與書桌分側配置), 隱私度佳(臥室獨立封閉)

matching_result_list.evidence: Third angle of the master bedroom, highlighting the extensive white wardrobe space ('衣櫃量充足') and the desk/workspace ('書桌工作台') positioned near the side window.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 衣櫃量充足(兩面大衣櫃適合家庭收納), 書桌工作台(窗邊工作檯面適合辦公或梳妝), 採光從側窗引入(白天可減少開燈), 動線順暢(床周圍走道寬不擁擠), 適合作主臥(空間感大收納完善)

matching_result_list.evidence: This bathroom features a glass shower enclosure ('乾濕分離佳'), an external window, and a wooden ceiling/feature wall ('木質天花與造型牆').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 乾濕分離佳(大片玻璃拉門區隔淋浴區), 衛浴對外窗(有小窗可排濕通風), 設備新穎(馬桶與面盆皆新式), 防滑地磚(淺色磚面適合長輩使用), 收納層架齊全(鏡櫃與毛巾架方便放置用品), 木質天花與造型牆(質感佳但需注意防潮)

matching_result_list.evidence: Secondary room with a large bay window and a low, built-in storage cabinet beneath it ('低檯度收納櫃'). The room is rectangular and bright.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(大面窗與小側窗), 通風佳(雙向窗戶有利空氣流通), 正矩形格局(家具好擺放), 低檯度收納櫃(窗下矮櫃可放雜物或當書櫃), 牆面與地面新(適合直接入住或客製傢俱)

matching_result_list.evidence: Secondary room characterized by a corner window providing '採光充足' and a spacious, empty '矩形格局'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光充足(兩側窗戶帶來自然光), 通風良好(角窗設計利穿堂風), 空間寬敞(可規劃雙人床與書桌), 正常樓高(天花平整不壓迫), 適合作兒童房或書房(彈性大)

matching_result_list.evidence: Secondary room with a single window and a doorway visible on the left, suggesting it is '靠近公共區'. It is a simple '矩形空間' with white walls.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光通風佳(單面大窗可開啟), 矩形空間(易規劃書桌與衣櫃), 靠近公共區(門外即客餐廳動線短), 牆面留白(方便之後加裝收納或層架), 安靜感佳(無冷氣室外機或大馬路視覺)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image shows an indoor parking space ('室內停車') with concrete columns near the side and visible wear/aging on the structure ('牆面有老舊痕跡').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 有專屬車位(劃線編號清楚), 室內停車(避免日晒雨淋), 柱位靠側邊(一側開車門較方便), 車道高度一般(適合一般房車), 牆面有老舊痕跡(結構需留意滲水或維修)

matching_result_list.evidence: Image captures a community entrance with a green metal structure acting as a '遮雨棚設計', tiled pavement, and a view into a landscaped '中庭綠化'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 有中庭綠化(可休憩並提供棟距), 採光通風尚可(開放式騎樓引自然光風), 社區出入口寬敞(進出與搬運物品方便), 有遮雨棚設計(雨天進出不淋雨), 磁磚鋪面易清潔(公共區維護成本較低)
